title: Sales Manager
description: We're Hiring: Lead - Institution Sales - Chennai Are you a go-getter with a passion for sales in Fruits & Vegetables (F&V), Agri, or FMCG? Do you thrive in B2B sales and love building long-term client relationships? If yes, we want you on our team! Why Join Esandhai Pvt Ltd? At E Sandhai, we are transforming the agri-supply chain by delivering fresh, high-quality produce to businesses across Tamil Nadu. As we expand, we're looking for a self-driven Institution Sales Lead to take charge and grow our institutional sales. Job Summary: We are looking for a self-driven and dynamic Lead - Institution Sales to drive and expand our institutional sales across Tamil Nadu. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in F&V, Agri, or FMCG sales, exceptional customer-handling skills, and a strong ability to build and maintain B2B relationships. Key Responsibilities: ✅ Develop and execute sales strategies to expand the institutional sales network across Tamil Nadu. ✅ Identify, acquire, and manage key institutional clients such as hotels, restaurants, caterers, corporate cafeterias, hospitals, and large-scale buyers. ✅ Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, ensuring long-term partnerships and repeat business. ✅ Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify new business opportunities and industry trends. ✅ Negotiate contracts and pricing agreements with institutional buyers to maximize profitability. ✅ Collaborate with internal teams (operations, logistics, procurement) to ensure seamless order fulfillment and customer satisfaction. ✅ Track sales performance and meet/exceed revenue targets. ✅ Act as a brand ambassador for E Sandhai, promoting our commitment to quality and sustainable agricultural sourcing. ✅ Handle customer queries, grievances, and escalations in a professional and timely manner. Key Skills & Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or a related field. Minimum 3 years of experience in institutional sales within F&V, Agri, or FMCG industries. Strong B2B sales experience, especially in acquiring and managing large institutional buyers. Excellent negotiation and communication skills. Ability to travel extensively within Tamil Nadu as per business needs. Self-motivated, target-driven, and capable of working independently. Benefits: Competitive salary + performance-based incentives. Career growth in a fast-growing agri-supply chain company. Travel allowances & other perks. Application & Interview Process: To Apply: Send your resume - hr@esandhai.in.
skills: Area Sales Officer, Marketing and Social Media manager, Product/Brand Manager

title: NDT Technician
company: DIAMOND NDT INSPECTION SERVICE PVT LTD
description: job Summary: As an NDT Visual Inspector, you will be responsible for conducting visual inspections on various components and structures, ensuring they meet quality standards and industry regulations. You will identify and document defects, ensuring the integrity and safety of our products and projects. Responsibilities: Perform visual inspections of welds, components, and structures using established NDT procedures and techniques. Identify and document defects, such as cracks, porosity, inclusions, and other non-conformances. Interpret inspection results and provide clear and concise reports. Maintain accurate records of inspections and findings. Ensure compliance with all relevant NDT standards and regulations. Collaborate with engineers and other team members to address inspection related issues. Utilize inspection tools and equipment, including magnifiers, flashlights, and other visual aids. Contribute to the improvement of inspection processes and procedures. Qualifications: [Desired Level of Education/Certification, e.g., High school diploma or equivalent, ASNT Level I/II certification preferred] Experience in NDT visual inspection techniques. Knowledge of relevant NDT standards and regulations. Strong attention to detail and ability to identify subtle defects. Excellent communication and documentation skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Experience with [Mention specific industries or materials, e.g., welding, piping, etc.]
additional_skills:
Ultrasonic Testing (UT): Using sound waves to detect flaws. 
Radiographic Testing (RT): Employing X-rays or gamma rays to visualize internal defects. 
Magnetic Particle Testing (MT): Detecting surface and near-surface cracks using magnetic fields. 
Dye Penetrant Testing (PT): Using a dye to reveal surface defects. 
Visual Inspection (VT): Carefully examining materials for surface defects.

title: FITTER
description: Job Title: Fitter (with ITI trade certification) Key Responsibilities: Assembly and Installation: Assemble and install mechanical components and machinery parts in accordance with blueprints, manuals, or specifications. Fit and adjust parts of machines and mechanical systems to ensure proper functioning. Maintenance and Repair: Conduct preventive maintenance and repair tasks for machinery, engines, and equipment. Troubleshoot mechanical issues and perform repairs to ensure the equipment is running efficiently. Measuring and Cutting: Use measuring instruments, such as calipers, micrometers, and rulers, to ensure components meet required specifications. Cut, shape, and trim materials using tools like saws, grinders, and drills. Welding and Fabrication: Perform welding, cutting, or fabricating metal parts or structures, if required. Ensure high-quality welds that meet safety and operational standards. Tool Handling and Maintenance: Safely operate and maintain hand tools, power tools, and machine tools. Keep tools and equipment in good condition and properly stored. Documentation and Reporting: Keep detailed records of repairs, maintenance, and installations performed. Report any issues, malfunctions, or breakdowns to supervisors or engineers. Safety Compliance: Follow safety procedures and wear appropriate safety gear to minimize risks. Maintain a clean and organized work environment. Skills Required: Technical Skills: Knowledge of mechanical systems, tools, and machinery. Problem-Solving: Ability to identify issues and find practical solutions. Attention to Detail: Accuracy in measuring, assembling, and fitting parts. Communication Skills: Ability to follow instructions and collaborate with colleagues and supervisors. Time Management: Efficiently manage tasks and meet deadlines. Welding Skills: Experience with welding techniques (arc, MIG, etc.), if required for the job. Qualifications: Education: ITI certification in Fitter or similar trade. Experience: 1-3 years of experience in a mechanical workshop or related field. Additional Certifications (optional): Safety training, welding certifications, etc.

title: WELDER
description: Job Title: Welder Qualifications: Educational Requirement : ITI (Industrial Training Institute) certification in Welder trade. Experience : 1-3 years of hands-on experience in welding processes, working in industries like manufacturing, construction, or maintenance. Key Responsibilities: Welding and Fabrication : Perform welding operations such as MIG, TIG, Stick, and Arc welding on various materials (e.g., steel, stainless steel, aluminum). Read and interpret blueprints, technical drawings, and specifications to determine welding requirements. Cut, shape, and weld metal parts as per the design and customer requirements. Equipment Maintenance : Operate and maintain welding equipment, ensuring proper functioning and safety standards. Clean and perform basic maintenance on welding machines, tools, and workstations. Inspection and Quality Control : Inspect welds for defects, strength, and quality, ensuring they meet industry standards. Ensure that welding procedures and safety standards are strictly followed. Conduct visual and mechanical inspection of welded joints. Safety Compliance : Ensure a safe working environment by adhering to safety regulations and using the necessary protective gear (gloves, helmets, etc.). Maintain a clean and organized workspace to prevent accidents and ensure operational efficiency. Collaboration and Teamwork : Work closely with other team members, including fabricators and engineers, to ensure the timely completion of projects. Collaborate with supervisors and managers to plan and execute welding tasks. Troubleshooting and Problem Solving : Identify issues related to welding equipment or materials and suggest corrective actions. Solve problems related to weld quality or equipment malfunction in a timely manner. Documentation and Reporting : Record welding activities and the types of materials used for quality assurance and traceability purposes. Report any discrepancies or issues to the supervisor or manager. Skills Required: Technical Skills : Proficiency in various welding techniques and processes (MIG, TIG, Arc, Stick). Basic understanding of welding symbols, blueprints, and technical drawings. Knowledge of materials and welding consumables. Attention to Detail : Ability to identify defects in welded joints and ensure high-quality standards. Physical Dexterity : Good hand-eye coordination and manual dexterity. Problem Solving : Ability to troubleshoot welding issues and find effective solutions.

title: SITE SUPERVISOR
description: Job Description: Site Supervisor at Mother Engineering Systems Position Title: Site Supervisor Location: [Location of the Site] Salary: ₹12,000/month Benefits: Accommodation and food provided Probation Period: 3 months Notice Period: 1 month About Us: Mother Engineering Systems is a leading provider of engineering services in pipeline fabrication, structural steel fabrication, and construction. We deliver high-quality solutions focusing on safety, precision, and timely execution. We are looking for a dedicated Site Supervisor to manage key site operations. Role Overview: As a Site Supervisor, you will oversee fire hydrant pipeline fabrication and erection, structural steel fabrication, labor management, material procurement, and accounts handling. Your role is crucial in ensuring that projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest standards. Key Responsibilities: Pipeline & Steel Fabrication/Erection: Supervise fabrication and erection of fire hydrant pipelines and structural steel, ensuring compliance with specifications and safety standards. Labor Management: Supervise labor, track attendance, and ensure efficiency and safety on-site. Material Procurement: Coordinate material procurement to prevent delays and ensure timely delivery. Financial Oversight: Assist with managing project finances, tracking expenditure, and staying within budget. Quality Control & Safety: Ensure work meets quality standards and complies with safety regulations. Reporting & Documentation: Maintain accurate records of site activities, material usage, labor attendance, and progress reports. Team Leadership: Lead the site team, resolve issues, and ensure high morale and productivity. Coordination: Ensure smooth communication between engineering and site teams for seamless project execution. Skills & Qualifications: Proven experience as a Site Supervisor in construction or engineering. Knowledge of fire hydrant pipeline and steel fabrication/erection. Strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills. Familiar with construction safety and financial management. Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively. Why Join Us? Competitive salary with accommodation and food provided. Exposure to high-profile projects, enhancing your skill set. Opportunity for long-term career growth and advancement. Supportive work environment focused on quality, safety, and efficient project completion.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled and motivated Embedded Software Developer with 2+ years of experience in embedded software development, real-time operating systems (RTOS), and MQTT. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing and optimizing software for embedded systems, with a focus on real-time performance and communication protocols. Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain embedded software for various applications. Implement and optimize software for real-time operating systems (RTOS). Develop and integrate communication protocols, particularly MQTT, for embedded systems. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Perform code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices in software development. Debug and troubleshoot complex software issues in embedded systems. Participate in system architecture design and contribute to technical documentation. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies in embedded systems. Qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field. 2+ years of experience in embedded software development. Strong proficiency in C/C++ programming languages. Experience with real-time operating systems (RTOS) such as FreeRTOS, or similar. Hands-on experience with MQTT protocol and its implementation in embedded systems. Familiarity with microcontrollers, ARM Cortex, or similar architectures. Knowledge of hardware interfaces and communication protocols (SPI, I2C, UART, etc.). Strong problem-solving skills and ability to debug complex issues. Excellent teamwork and communication skills. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with IoT devices and cloud connectivity. Familiarity with version control systems such as Git. Knowledge of other communication protocols (e.g., Bluetooth, Zigbee, Wi-Fi). Understanding of cybersecurity principles in embedded systems. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and innovative projects. Collaborative and inclusive work environment. Professional growth and development opportunities.

Freshers with strong analytical skills and a good academic background are welcome to apply. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong proficiency in MS Excel, Word, and PowerPoint. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

title: AREA SALES  MANAGER
description: Key Responsibilities: Sales Target Achievement: Develop and execute sales strategies to consistently meet and exceed sales targets for the assigned region, including volume and revenue goals. Team Management: Lead and motivate a team of ice cream sales representatives, providing coaching, performance feedback, and training to optimize individual and team performance. Retailer Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with key retail partners like supermarkets, convenience stores, and food service outlets, ensuring optimal product placement and visibility. Distribution Network Oversight: Manage the distribution network within the territory, ensuring efficient delivery of products to retailers and monitoring inventory levels. Market Analysis: Conduct market research to identify sales opportunities, analyze competitor activity, and stay updated on market trends to inform sales strategies. New Product Launch: Actively promote and launch new ice cream products to retailers, coordinating marketing efforts to drive customer demand. Sales Reporting and Analysis: Regularly monitor sales performance through data analysis, generating reports to identify areas for improvement and make informed business decisions. Customer Service: Address customer concerns promptly, ensuring customer satisfaction and building loyalty. Required Skills and Qualifications: Proven experience in sales management, ideally within the food and beverage industry, with a focus on retail sales. Strong leadership and team building skills to motivate and develop a sales team. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build relationships with retailers and customers. Analytical skills to interpret sales data and make informed decisions. Understanding of distribution channels and logistics management. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and sales CRM tools. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field preferred.

title: Customer Service Engineer
description: நிறுவனத்தின் பின்னணி Qtech Services என்பது அலுவலக ஆட்டோமேஷன் தீர்வுகளில் முன்னணி நிறுவனமாக விளங்குகிறது. எங்கள் நிறுவனம் Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Riso, Epson போன்ற பிரபலமான பிராண்டுகளின் மல்டிஃபங்க்ஷன் பிரிண்டர், புரடக்ஷன் பிரிண்டர், டிஜிட்டல் டூப்ளிகேட்டர், சைனேஜ் பிரிண்டர் ஆகியவற்றின் விற்பனை, சேவை மற்றும் வாடகை வழங்குவதில் சிறப்பு பெற்றது. 26 ஆண்டுகளுக்கும் மேலான அனுபவத்துடன் , நாங்கள் பாண்டிச்சேரி, கடலூர், வேலூர், சென்னை போன்ற நகரங்களில் நம்பகமான சேவைகளை வழங்கி வருகிறோம். எங்கள் முக்கிய அலுவலகம் பாண்டிச்சேரியில் மற்றும் பிராந்திய அலுவலகம் கடலூரில் உள்ளது. எங்கள் வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு முன்னோக்கிய தீர்வுகள், விரைவான சேவை மற்றும் சிறந்த தொழில்நுட்ப ஆதரவு வழங்குவதை எங்கள் நோக்கமாகக் கொண்டுள்ளோம். தொழில்துறையில் எங்கள் வளர்ச்சியின் ஒரு பகுதியாக, எங்கள் புதிய அணியில் இணைந்து வளர ஆவலான, திறமையான நபர்களை நாங்கள் அமர்த்த விரும்புகிறோம்! வேலை விவரம் – பிரிண்டர் சேவை பொறியாளர் வேலை பெயர்: பிரிண்டர் சேவை பொறியாளர் (புதியவர்கள் & அனுபவம் உள்ளவர்கள்) நிறுவனம்: Qtech Services இடம்: பாண்டிச்சேரி & கடலூர் வேலை வகை: முழு நேரம் கல்வித் தகுதி: டிப்ளமோ / ITI (இலெக்ட்ரானிக்ஸ், எலக்ட்ரிக்கல், மெக்கானிக்கல் அல்லது தொடர்புடைய துறைகள்) அனுபவம்: புதியவர்களும் அனுபவமுள்ளவர்களும் விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம் சம்பளம்: தொழில் தரத்திற்கேற்ப வழங்கப்படும் வேலை பொறுப்புகள்: Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Riso, Epson போன்ற பிராண்டுகளின் பிரிண்டர், காப்பியர் மற்றும் டிஜிட்டல் டூப்ளிகேட்டர்களின் நிறுவல், பராமரிப்பு, மற்றும் பழுது நீக்கம் செய்ய வேண்டும். ஹார்ட்வேர் மற்றும் சாப்ட்வேர் தொடர்பான கோளாறுகளை கண்டறிந்து சரி செய்ய வேண்டும். வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு தொழில்நுட்ப ஆதரவு வழங்குதல் மற்றும் அவர்களுக்கு தேவையான வழிகாட்டுதல் செய்தல். வழக்கமான பராமரிப்பு பணிகள் மூலம் பிரிண்டர்களின் செயல்திறனை உறுதி செய்தல். சேவை அறிக்கைகளை தொகுத்து மேலாண்மைக்கு சமர்ப்பித்தல் . வேறு சேவை குழுவுடன் ஒருங்கிணைந்து வேலை செய்ய வேண்டும் . வாடிக்கையாளர்களுடன் நல்ல உறவுகளை ஏற்படுத்தி, நீண்டகால சந்தைப்படுத்தல் வளர்ச்சியில் பங்கெடுக்க வேண்டும் . தேவையான திறன்கள்: இலெக்ட்ரானிக்ஸ், எலக்ட்ரிக்கல் மற்றும் மெக்கானிக்கல் துறையில் அடிப்படை அறிவு. பிரிண்டர் மற்றும் காப்பியர் பழுது நீக்கம் செய்யும் திறன் . சிக்கல் தீர்க்கும் திறன் மற்றும் அனாலிட்டிக்கல் திறன்கள் . கணினி மற்றும் நெட்வொர்க் அமைப்புகள் பற்றிய அடிப்படை அறிவு . பாண்டிச்சேரி, கடலூர் மற்றும் சுற்றுவட்டார இடங்களுக்கு பயணம் செய்ய தயாராக இருக்க வேண்டும் . தெளிவான தொடர்பு திறன்கள் மற்றும் வாடிக்கையாளர் தொடர்பு திறன் . ஏன் Qtech Services-ல் சேர வேண்டும்? ✅ 26+ ஆண்டுகளாக அலுவலக ஆட்டோமேஷன் துறையில் முன்னணி நிறுவனம் ✅ உலகப் புகழ்பெற்ற பிராண்டுகளுடன் பணியாற்றும் வாய்ப்பு ✅ நேரடிச் சேவை பயிற்சி மற்றும் தொழில்முறை வளர்ச்சி வாய்ப்புகள் ✅ சிறந்த பணியிட சூழல் மற்றும் வளர்ச்சிக்கான இடம் இந்த வேலைக்கு ஆர்வமுள்ளவர்கள் தங்கள் ரெசுமியை info@qtechservices.co.in க்கு அனுப்பவும் அல்லது எங்களை 88 84 88 1612  மூலம் தொடர்பு கொள்ளவும். உங்கள் திறமையை வெளிப்படுத்த Qtech Services -இல் இணையுங்கள்!

description: நிறுவனத்தின் பின்னணி Qtech Services என்பது அலுவலக ஆட்டோமேஷன் தீர்வுகளில் முன்னணி நிறுவனமாக விளங்குகிறது. எங்கள் நிறுவனம் Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Riso, Epson போன்ற பிரபலமான பிராண்டுகளின் மல்டிஃபங்க்ஷன் பிரிண்டர், புரடக்ஷன் பிரிண்டர், டிஜிட்டல் டூப்ளிகேட்டர், சைனேஜ் பிரிண்டர் ஆகியவற்றின் விற்பனை, சேவை மற்றும் வாடகை வழங்குவதில் சிறப்பு பெற்றது. 26 ஆண்டுகளுக்கும் மேலான அனுபவத்துடன் , நாங்கள் பாண்டிச்சேரி, கடலூர், வேலூர், சென்னை போன்ற நகரங்களில் நம்பகமான சேவைகளை வழங்கி வருகிறோம். எங்கள் முக்கிய அலுவலகம் பாண்டிச்சேரியில் மற்றும் பிராந்திய அலுவலகம் கடலூரில் உள்ளது. எங்கள் வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு முன்னோக்கிய தீர்வுகள், விரைவான சேவை மற்றும் சிறந்த தொழில்நுட்ப ஆதரவு வழங்குவதை எங்கள் நோக்கமாகக் கொண்டுள்ளோம். தொழில்துறையில் எங்கள் வளர்ச்சியின் ஒரு பகுதியாக, எங்கள் புதிய அணியில் இணைந்து வளர ஆவலான, திறமையான நபர்களை நாங்கள் அமர்த்த விரும்புகிறோம்! வேலை விவரம் – பிரிண்டர் சேவை பொறியாளர் வேலை பெயர்: பிரிண்டர் சேவை பொறியாளர் (புதியவர்கள் & அனுபவம் உள்ளவர்கள்) நிறுவனம்: Qtech Services இடம்: பாண்டிச்சேரி & கடலூர் வேலை வகை: முழு நேரம் கல்வித் தகுதி: டிப்ளமோ / ITI (இலெக்ட்ரானிக்ஸ், எலக்ட்ரிக்கல், மெக்கானிக்கல் அல்லது தொடர்புடைய துறைகள்) அனுபவம்: புதியவர்களும் அனுபவமுள்ளவர்களும் விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம் சம்பளம்: தொழில் தரத்திற்கேற்ப வழங்கப்படும் வேலை பொறுப்புகள்: Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Riso, Epson போன்ற பிராண்டுகளின் பிரிண்டர், காப்பியர் மற்றும் டிஜிட்டல் டூப்ளிகேட்டர்களின் நிறுவல், பராமரிப்பு, மற்றும் பழுது நீக்கம் செய்ய வேண்டும். ஹார்ட்வேர் மற்றும் சாப்ட்வேர் தொடர்பான கோளாறுகளை கண்டறிந்து சரி செய்ய வேண்டும். வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு தொழில்நுட்ப ஆதரவு வழங்குதல் மற்றும் அவர்களுக்கு தேவையான வழிகாட்டுதல் செய்தல். வழக்கமான பராமரிப்பு பணிகள் மூலம் பிரிண்டர்களின் செயல்திறனை உறுதி செய்தல். சேவை அறிக்கைகளை தொகுத்து மேலாண்மைக்கு சமர்ப்பித்தல் . வேறு சேவை குழுவுடன் ஒருங்கிணைந்து வேலை செய்ய வேண்டும் . வாடிக்கையாளர்களுடன் நல்ல உறவுகளை ஏற்படுத்தி, நீண்டகால சந்தைப்படுத்தல் வளர்ச்சியில் பங்கெடுக்க வேண்டும் . தேவையான திறன்கள்: இலெக்ட்ரானிக்ஸ், எலக்ட்ரிக்கல் மற்றும் மெக்கானிக்கல் துறையில் அடிப்படை அறிவு. பிரிண்டர் மற்றும் காப்பியர் பழுது நீக்கம் செய்யும் திறன் . சிக்கல் தீர்க்கும் திறன் மற்றும் அனாலிட்டிக்கல் திறன்கள் . கணினி மற்றும் நெட்வொர்க் அமைப்புகள் பற்றிய அடிப்படை அறிவு . பாண்டிச்சேரி, கடலூர் மற்றும் சுற்றுவட்டார இடங்களுக்கு பயணம் செய்ய தயாராக இருக்க வேண்டும் . தெளிவான தொடர்பு திறன்கள் மற்றும் வாடிக்கையாளர் தொடர்பு திறன் . ஏன் Qtech Services-ல் சேர வேண்டும்? ✅ 26+ ஆண்டுகளாக அலுவலக ஆட்டோமேஷன் துறையில் முன்னணி நிறுவனம் ✅ உலகப் புகழ்பெற்ற பிராண்டுகளுடன் பணியாற்றும் வாய்ப்பு ✅ நேரடிச் சேவை பயிற்சி மற்றும் தொழில்முறை வளர்ச்சி வாய்ப்புகள் ✅ சிறந்த பணியிட சூழல் மற்றும் வளர்ச்சிக்கான இடம் இந்த வேலைக்கு ஆர்வமுள்ளவர்கள் தங்கள் ரெசுமியை info@qtechservices.co.in க்கு அனுப்பவும் அல்லது எங்களை 88 84 88 16 12   தொடர்பு கொள்ளவும். உங்கள் திறமையை வெளிப்படுத்த Qtech Services -இல் இணையுங்கள்!

description: Sayar Motors is looking for an experienced Service Manager with 5+ years of experience in the automobile industry. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the entire service department, ensuring high customer satisfaction, efficient operations, and business growth. This role requires strong leadership, technical expertise, and the ability to manage a team of service advisors, mechanics, and technicians while maintaining the highest standards of service quality. Key Responsibilities: •    Oversee the day-to-day operations of the service department. •    Ensure timely and quality service of Bajaj Motorcycles and Chetak EVs. •    Manage and train service advisors, mechanics, and technicians. •    Monitor service productivity, efficiency, and customer satisfaction. •    Implement and maintain best practices to improve service quality and reduce turnaround time. •    Handle customer complaints and ensure issues are resolved professionally. •    Work towards achieving service revenue and customer retention targets. •    Coordinate with the spare parts department to ensure availability of parts. •    Ensure compliance with Bajaj Auto’s service guidelines and standards. •    Prepare and analyze service reports, productivity data, and customer feedback. Requirements: •    5+ years of experience in an automobile service department (preferably two-wheelers). •    ITI/Diploma/Degree in Automobile or Mechanical Engineering is preferred. •    Strong technical knowledge of two-wheelers and service processes. •    Leadership skills to manage and motivate a service team. •    Good customer handling and problem-solving skills. •    Ability to work with DMS (Dealer Management System) and service reporting tools.

title: INTERNSHIP TRAINEE
description: 1. You are eligible for a stipend of Rs.10,000.00/- per month (Rupees Ten Thousand Only) during your training period. 2. If you are not attending the training without intimation/permission continuously for three (3) consecutive days or more, you shall be deemed to have abandoned your Internship Program with the company effective from the date of your absence . 3. If you desire to withdraw from your Internship program before completing twelve months, you are required to provide 15 days of notice to the organization. 4. During your training period you are expected not engage yourself directly or indirectly in any other business or employment. You must devote your whole time, best skill, and efforts to the training program. 5. During the training period, you must abide by the rules and policies of the company. 6. The training will be conducted for six(6) days a week and the training time will be as per the office hours . 7. During the training period, trainees shall not be entitled to any paid stipend leaves. You shall be eligible for holidays declared by Muthoot Finance Limited. 8.The Internship completion letter will be issued only upon satisfactory completion of 6 months of training and without any interruptions, irregularity, disciplinary action, etc.

title: ACCOUNTANT
description: Job Description: To join our expanding team, we are looking for a careful and seasoned construction accountant. The ideal applicant will oversee all financial facets of building projects, guaranteeing correct financial documentation and adherence to industry norms. They will be essential to financial reporting, cost tracking, and budgeting in order to support the success of our projects and the financial stability of our business. Principal Duties: Financial Management: Keep an eye on all construction project-related financial activities, such as expense tracking, billing, and budgeting. Cost analysis: Track and evaluate project expenses to make sure they are in line with budgets and to find areas where money might be saved. Financial Reporting: Create thorough financial reports that include balance sheets, profit and loss statements, and project cost summaries. Compliance: Verify adherence to business rules, accounting standards, and industry regulations. Account Reconciliation: Regularly reconcile accounts payable and receivable. Project Support: Work together with project managers to offer financial analysis and assistance for efficient project planning and implementation. Auditing: Help with both internal and external audits by supplying the required paperwork and justifications. Qualifications: Education: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field. Experience: Minimum of 2-3 years of accounting experience, preferably in the construction industry. Skills: Strong understanding of construction accounting principles and practices. Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Tally. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Detail-oriented with strong organizational abilities. Effective communication and interpersonal skills.

Key Responsibilities Operate MIG welding equipment to fabricate metal components. Read and interpret engineering drawings and welding symbols . Set up welding machines, select appropriate wire, gas, and settings . Perform tack welding, spot welding, and full welding operations. Inspect and test welds for quality and precision. Qualifications & Skills ITI/Diploma in Welding or a related field. 3+ years of experience in MIG welding (experience in TIG/ARC welding is a plus). Strong knowledge of welding processes, materials, and metallurgy . Ability to use measuring tools like calipers, micrometers, and gauges . Understanding of welding defects and corrective actions . Ability to work in shifts and a team-oriented environment . Benefits ✔ Free food provided. ✔ On-time salary. ✔ Career growth opportunities.

title: Line Quality Inspector
description: Job Overview: The Production Supervisor is responsible for overseeing daily operations in the production department of the aluminum diecasting plant. This role ensures that production targets, quality standards, safety requirements, and operational proced Key Responsibilities: Product Inspection: Conduct real-time inspections of diecasted aluminum parts during the manufacturing process, ensuring they meet all relevant quality standards and specifications. Defect Identification & Reporting: Identify any defects, discrepancies, or non-conformities in the production line. Document and report these issues to the appropriate personnel for corrective actions. Quality Assurance: Monitor and ensure that the production process adheres to the established quality protocols and standards. Conduct in-process checks for critical parameters such as dimensions, finish, and strength. Troubleshooting & Corrective Actions: Work closely with production teams to investigate quality issues and help implement corrective actions to resolve them. Ensure that corrective actions are followed through to avoid recurring defects. Data Recording & Documentation: Maintain accurate records of inspections, test results, and any non-conformance reports. Ensure all documentation is up-to-date and in compliance with company standards. Collaboration with Production Teams: Collaborate with production supervisors and operators to ensure that all quality control measures are understood and followed. Provide feedback and recommendations for quality improvements. Calibration and Equipment Maintenance: Ensure that all inspection tools, gauges, and measuring equipment are calibrated properly and maintained in good working order. Training and Guidance: Provide training and guidance to production line staff on quality control standards, inspection processes, and best practices for maintaining quality throughout production. Safety Compliance: Ensure that all inspections are conducted in accordance with safety standards and report any safety concerns promptly. Requirements: Education: A High School Diploma or equivalent. A degree in Mechanical Engineering or Quality Management is a plus. Experience: 1+ years of experience in quality control or inspection, preferably in the automotive, diecasting, or aluminum manufacturing industry. Skills: Strong attention to detail and ability to detect defects and non-conformities. Knowledge of diecasting processes and quality assurance protocols. Familiarity with measuring instruments and gauges (e.g., calipers, micrometers, and CMM machines). Basic knowledge of ISO 9001 or similar quality management standards. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple priorities. Personal Attributes: Excellent communication skills to provide feedback clearly to teams. Proactive, with the ability to take initiative and work independently. Ability to work well under pressure and meet quality deadlines

title: Electrical Maintenance Technician
description: Job Overview: Electrical Maintenance Technician (4 vacancy ) Company: Auto Diecasting Company Location: [Ganapathy, Coimbatore ] WHATS APP NUMBER : 8190078080 Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled Electrical Maintenance Technician to join Auto Diecasting Company. This role focuses on maintaining, troubleshooting, and repairing electrical systems and equipment within our manufacturing facility. The Electrical Maintenance Technician will ensure that all electrical systems operate efficiently, safely, and with minimal downtime, contributing to overall production performance. Key Responsibilities: Electrical System Maintenance & Repair: Troubleshoot, repair, and maintain electrical systems, machinery, and equipment. Perform preventive maintenance to avoid unplanned downtime and extend equipment lifespan. Diagnose electrical issues and implement solutions to prevent production disruptions. Installation & Upgrades: Install and upgrade electrical equipment and control panels. Ensure all installations meet safety standards and industry codes. Safety Compliance: Adhere to safety standards and ensure electrical systems comply with safety regulations. Follow lockout/tagout procedures during maintenance activities to prevent accidents. Troubleshooting & Diagnostics: Use testing tools to diagnose electrical faults and quickly identify issues. Record diagnostics and repairs for future reference and efficiency tracking. Inventory Management: Maintain an inventory of electrical spare parts and tools. Coordinate with procurement to ensure the availability of essential parts. Emergency Support: Provide support during electrical emergencies to minimize production delays. Respond to equipment breakdowns and implement immediate corrective actions. Qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent; technical certification in Electrical Engineering or related field preferred. 3-5 years of experience in electrical maintenance, ideally in manufacturing. Strong knowledge of electrical systems, circuits, wiring, and PLCs. Proficient in using electrical diagnostic tools. Physical Requirements: Ability to lift up to 50 pounds and perform physical tasks such as bending and working in confined spaces. Working Conditions: Full-time position with potential overtime. Work in a manufacturing or production environment. Compensation: Competitive salary based on experience.

title: VMC Setter
description: Job Overview: VMC Setter Company : Auto Diecasting Company Position Overview : We are looking for a skilled VMC (Vertical Machining Center) Setter to join our team at Auto Diecasting Company. The VMC Setter will be responsible for setting up and operating vertical machining centers to produce high-quality die-cast components. This role requires precision, attention to detail, and the ability to work in a fast-paced manufacturing environment. Key Responsibilities : VMC Setup & Operation : Set up and configure VMC machines according to engineering specifications and production requirements. Ensure that tools, fixtures, and programs are correctly installed and calibrated. Operate VMC machines to produce parts within the specified tolerances and quality standards. Quality Control & Inspection : Inspect finished parts for conformance to specifications using measuring tools such as micrometers, calipers, and gauges. Perform routine checks to ensure that parts are produced to the correct quality standards. Troubleshoot any deviations or defects and make necessary adjustments. Tool Maintenance : Monitor the condition of tools and replace worn or damaged tools as needed. Maintain tool life and ensure the VMC machine operates efficiently. Machine Maintenance : Perform basic maintenance on VMC machines, such as cleaning, lubricating, and adjusting components. Report any mechanical issues to the maintenance team to ensure minimal downtime. Production Efficiency : Ensure that the VMC machine is running at optimal speed and efficiency. Work to minimize machine downtime and maximize output. Documentation & Reporting : Maintain accurate records of setup procedures, tooling, and machine performance. Report any production issues, tool wear, or quality concerns to the supervisor. Qualifications : High school diploma or equivalent; technical certification in machining or related field is a plus. 2-3 years of experience in setting up and operating VMC machines, preferably in a manufacturing environment. Strong knowledge of VMC operation, tooling, and CNC programming. Ability to read and interpret engineering drawings and blueprints. Experience with measuring instruments and quality control procedures. Physical Requirements : Ability to stand for long periods and lift up to 50 pounds. Comfortable working in a manufacturing environment with exposure to machinery and equipment. Working Conditions : Full-time position with potential for overtime. Primarily works in a manufacturing or production environment. Compensation : Competitive salary based on experience.

title: MAINTENANCE INCHARGE
description: Job Description: Maintenance Incharge Company : Auto Diecasting Company Key Responsibilities : Leadership & Team Management : Supervise and lead the maintenance team, providing guidance and support. Assign tasks and ensure staff have the necessary tools and resources. Foster a culture of continuous improvement and safety within the team. Maintenance Strategy & Planning : Develop and implement a preventive maintenance plan to reduce equipment downtime and extend lifespan. Plan and schedule maintenance activities to minimize production disruptions. Oversee shift rotations and maintenance schedules for optimal coverage. Equipment Maintenance & Repairs : Oversee maintenance and repair of all production equipment, including die-casting machines and conveyors. Coordinate troubleshooting, diagnostics, and repair of mechanical and electrical systems. Ensure repairs are carried out promptly to restore machinery to optimal working conditions. Inventory & Spare Parts Management : Maintain an organized inventory of tools, spare parts, and maintenance supplies. Work with procurement to ensure timely replenishment of critical spare parts. Safety & Compliance : Ensure all maintenance activities adhere to safety, health, and environmental regulations. Conduct safety inspections, risk assessments, and corrective actions as necessary. Enforce safety protocols to create a safe working environment for all team members. Budget Management & Cost Control : Develop and manage the maintenance budget, ensuring cost-effective use of resources. Monitor and control expenditures related to parts, labor, and repairs. Continuous Improvement : Identify areas for improvement in maintenance operations and implement strategies for increased efficiency. Collaborate with engineering and production teams to optimize machine performance. Reporting & Documentation : Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, repairs, inspections, and parts usage. Prepare reports on maintenance activities, equipment performance, and costs for management review. Emergency Response & Support : Lead the response to urgent mechanical failures, minimizing production downtime. Coordinate with external service providers for specialized repairs as needed. Qualifications : Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience). 5-7 years of experience in maintenance management, preferably in manufacturing or die-casting environments. Strong leadership skills with experience managing a maintenance team. Knowledge of mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic, electrical, and industrial automation systems. Strong problem-solving abilities and the capacity to work under pressure. Physical Requirements : Ability to work in a manufacturing environment with exposure to machinery and potential hazards. Ability to lift up to 50 pounds and perform physical tasks such as standing, bending, and working in tight spaces.

title: Production Supervisor
description: Job Overview: The Production Supervisor is responsible for overseeing daily operations in the production department of the aluminum diecasting plant. This role ensures that production targets, quality standards, safety requirements, and operational procedures are met efficiently. The supervisor will lead, train, and coordinate production staff, ensuring smooth operations and adherence to company policies. Key Responsibilities: Production Oversight: Supervise and monitor the entire production process, ensuring that aluminum diecasting production runs smoothly, efficiently, and according to schedule. Team Leadership: Lead a team of machine operators, assemblers, and other production personnel. Assign daily tasks and ensure a productive and safe work environment. Quality Control: Ensure that the diecasting components meet the required quality standards and specifications. Conduct regular inspections and audits of products. Process Improvement: Identify areas for improvement in the production process. Propose and implement cost-effective solutions for process optimization and continuous improvement. Safety Management: Enforce adherence to all safety regulations and protocols in the workplace to prevent accidents and ensure the safety of the team. Production Planning: Assist in production scheduling and planning to ensure efficient use of resources and timely delivery of orders. Inventory and Equipment Management: Maintain accurate inventory of raw materials, components, and finished goods. Monitor equipment performance and ensure timely maintenance and repair. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate records related to production output, downtime, safety reports, and other production-related data. Training and Development: Provide on-the-job training to new employees and existing team members. Foster a positive learning environment to improve skill sets and productivity. Requirements: Education: A bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Manufacturing, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience in a similar role in manufacturing). Skills: Strong leadership, communication, and team management skills. In-depth knowledge of diecasting processes, machinery, and quality standards. Proficiency in reading technical drawings and specifications. Good problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Familiarity with health and safety regulations in a manufacturing setting. Personal Attributes: Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Ability to manage multiple priorities effectively. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity for career advancement. Health and safety-focused work environment.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Role Description This is a full-time on-site role located in Chengalpattu for a Digital Marketing Executive at Skiez Technologies India Pvt Ltd. The Digital Marketing Executive will be responsible for marketing, communication, social media marketing, web content writing, and web analytics. Your role · Create and implement inclusive digital marketing strategies by utilising different digital mediums and setting measurable KPIs. · Collaborate with other teams (like content, sales, and customer service) to ensure cohesive and effective marketing campaigns. · Manage digital campaigns, monitor performance reports, analyse data, and make data-driven recommendations. · Optimise website performance, including organic traffic, bounce rate, and conversion rates to improve user experience and drive lead generation. · Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify industry trends and new growth opportunities. Your tasks · Create and curate social media campaigns, including content creation, publishing, and community management. · Manage and optimise PPC campaigns on various platforms, including Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads. · Conduct keyword research and on-page optimisation to increase website rankings and drive organic traffic. · Develop and execute email marketing campaigns. · Analyse analytics and engagement metrics to measure campaign performance. · Prepare and present monthly/quarterly reports to stakeholders. Your profile · 1+ years of experience in digital marketing or content marketing. · Experience with web analytics tools like Google Analytics and Search Console. · Proficient in marketing automation tools, such as HubSpot, Ahrefs, Yoast, etc. · Strong knowledge of digital marketing, including SEO, SEM, PPC, Google Ads, email marketing and social media. · Excellent communication, presentation and interpersonal skills. Preferred skills and qualifications · Experience with graphic design and content production. · Knowledge of website CMS and marketing automation tools. Job Type: Full-time Pay: ₹10,007.37 - ₹15,000.00 per month Schedule: Day shift Work Location: In person

title: TIG Welder
description: We are seeking a skilled Hydraulic Cylinder TIG Welder to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in TIG welding, particularly with hydraulic cylinders, and possess a strong understanding of welding techniques, safety protocols, and quality control processes. Key Responsibilities: Perform TIG welding on hydraulic cylinders and related components. Interpret and follow engineering drawings, blueprints, and specifications. Set up and operate welding equipment, ensuring proper calibration and maintenance. Inspect welds for quality and adherence to specifications. Identify and troubleshoot welding defects, making necessary adjustments. Collaborate with engineering and production teams to meet project timelines. Maintain a clean and organized work area, adhering to safety standards. Document work performed and report any issues or improvements. High school diploma or equivalent; technical welding certification preferred. Proven experience in TIG welding, particularly with hydraulic components. Strong knowledge of welding techniques, tools, and materials. Ability to read and interpret blueprints and technical drawings. Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills. Strong commitment to safety and quality. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Physical Requirements: Ability to lift and carry heavy materials up to 10Kg. Ability to stand for extended periods and perform physically demanding tasks. Must have good hand-eye coordination and manual dexterity.

title: Arc & Mig welder
description: We are looking for a skilled Arc and MIG Welder to join our team. The successful candidate will have experience in both arc and MIG welding processes, a strong understanding of safety protocols, and the ability to read technical drawings and specifications. Key Responsibilities: Perform arc and MIG welding on various metals and materials. Interpret and follow engineering drawings, blueprints, and specifications. Set up and operate welding equipment, ensuring optimal performance and safety. Inspect welds for quality and compliance with industry standards. You will be responsible for understanding customer needs, explaining service procedures, and coordinating with the workshop team to deliver timely and quality service. Key Responsibilities: •    Greet customers and understand their service requirements. •    Explain service details, estimated costs, and timelines to customers. •    Create job cards and maintain service records accurately. •    Coordinate with technicians to ensure timely completion of repairs. •    Conduct vehicle inspections and recommend necessary repairs or maintenance. •    Keep customers updated on the progress of their vehicle service. •    Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent communication and problem-solving. •    Promote additional services and genuine spare parts to enhance vehicle performance. •    Handle customer feedback and escalate issues when necessary.
skills: Automotive Service Technician (Two and Three Wheelers)

title: Sales Executive
description: Sayar Motors is looking for a dynamic and customer-oriented Sales Executive to join our team. The role involves selling Bajaj Motorcycles and Chetak EVs, assisting customers in choosing the right vehicle, and ensuring a smooth buying experience. The ideal candidate should have strong communication skills, a passion for automobiles, and a drive to achieve sales targets. Key Responsibilities: •    Greet and assist customers in the showroom, understanding their needs. •    Explain vehicle features, specifications, and financing options. •    Conduct test rides and ensure customers have a great experience. •    Follow up with potential customers and convert inquiries into sales. •    Maintain relationships with existing customers for repeat business and referrals. •    Achieve monthly sales targets and contribute to the dealership’s growth. •    Coordinate with the finance and insurance team to complete the sales process. •    Stay updated on product knowledge, competitor offerings, and market trends.
skills: Dealership Sales and Value Added Services Executive

title: Mechanic
description: Sayar Motors is looking for skilled and hardworking Two-Wheeler Mechanics to join our service team. Whether you are a fresher eager to learn or an experienced mechanic, this is a great opportunity to work with an authorized Bajaj Motorcycles and Chetak EV dealer. You will be responsible for servicing, diagnosing, and repairing two-wheelers to ensure customer satisfaction and vehicle performance. Key Responsibilities: •    Perform routine service, maintenance, and repairs on Bajaj motorcycles and Chetak EVs. •    Diagnose mechanical and electrical issues and provide solutions. •    Assist in engine tuning, oil changes, brake adjustments, and general repairs. •    Ensure quality workmanship and follow company service standards. •    Use tools and diagnostic equipment effectively for accurate repairs. •    Maintain cleanliness and organization of the service area. •    Work as part of a team to meet service targets and deadlines. •    Attend training sessions to enhance skills and stay updated on new technology. Requirements: •    Freshers or experienced mechanics with a passion for two-wheelers. •    ITI/Diploma in Automobile/Mechanical or relevant experience preferred. •    Basic knowledge of motorcycle parts, servicing, and repairs. •    Ability to learn quickly and follow instructions. •    Strong work ethic, reliability, and teamwork skills.
skills: Automotive Service Technician (Two and Three Wheelers)

title: Assembly  Engineer
company: FIVE FINGERS EXPORTS INDIA PVT LTD
description: Assembly Technician Job Location: Coimbatore ABOUT FIVE FINGERS EXPORT INDIA PVT LTD Established in 2011, Five Fingers Exports is a leading manufacturer and exporter of packaging and printing machines. Over the years, we have emerged as a distinguished market leader, with over 4500+ installations worldwide. Our expertise lies in the production of machines for the non-woven and PP woven Non-Woven bag making machines, Printing Machines, and allied sectors. At Five Fingers Exports, we take pride in our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. With more than 12000 different spares portfolios and cutting-edge infrastructure for about 75,000 Sq ft, we develop a wide range of machinery and ensure their quality through rigorous testing. Our team of highly educated professionals stays up to date with the latest advancements in mechanization to deliver optimal efficiency, robustness, and long-term service life. Job Overview: Assembly Technician is responsible for assemble the machine as per assembly drawings, testing, and ensuring that machines assembled properly and meet quality standards. Maintaining tools and equipment properly cleaned and placed regularly. JOB DESCRIPTION: Assemble and fit mechanical parts and components according to detailed drawings and specifications. Use hand tools, power tools, and machinery to assemble components effectively and safely Assist in troubleshooting and resolving simple mechanical issues during assembly. Maintain a clean and organized work area, adhering to safety protocols and guidelines Collaborate with senior technicians and team members to meet production goals and deadlines. SKILLS REQUIRED: Tools knowledge Able to read the assembly drawings EXPERIENCE: Minimum 1+ years’ experience QUALIFICATION: ITI/DME

title: Electrical Control Panel Wiring technician
company: FIVE FINGERS EXPORTS INDIA PVT LTD
description: POSITION: ELECTRICAL ENGINEER ABOUT FIVE FINGERS EXPORT INDIA PVT LTD Established in 2011, Five Fingers Exports is a leading manufacturer and exporter of packaging and printing machines. Over the years, we have emerged as a distinguished market leader, with over 4500+ installations worldwide. Our expertise lies in the production of machines for PP Woven, Non-woven bag making machine and printing machinery, and allied sectors. At Five Fingers Exports, we take pride in our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. With more than 12000 different spares portfolios and cutting-edge infrastructure for about 75,000 Sq ft, we develop a wide range of machinery and ensure their quality through rigorous testing. Our team of highly educated professionals stays up to date with the latest advancements in mechanization to deliver optimal efficiency, robustness, and long-term service life. Electrical Engineer Job Overview: Electrical Engineer has the responsibility to build control panel wiring as per electrical drawing and Machine field wiring. JOB DESCRIPTION: Reading Blueprints and Electrical Diagrams: Understanding technical drawings, schematics, and electrical diagrams to comprehend the layout and requirements of the electrical panels. Panel Assembly: Assembling and installing electrical components such as circuit breakers, Drives, transformers, relays, switches, and wiring within control panels according to specifications and safety standards. Wiring and Termination: Connecting wires to components and devices based on the wiring diagrams, ensuring proper termination, insulation, and routing to ensure functionality and safety. SKILLS REQUIRED: Good knowledge of electrical systems, wiring diagrams, blueprints, and electrical codes and regulations. Understanding safety procedures and precautions related to electrical installations. Ability to read technical drawings, schematics, and wiring diagrams. Proficiency in assembling, installing, and troubleshooting electrical panels and control systems. EXPERIENCE: Minimum 2+ years experience in Electrical Control panel Wiring QUALIFICATION: Dip/ BE (EEE / E & I /Mechatronics)

description: 1. Server Management & Maintenance Configure and manage web servers (Apache, Nginx, IIS, etc.). Ensure uptime, performance, and scalability. Manage content restrictions and copyright policies.

description: The HR Executive plays a critical role in managing the human resources functions within the organization. This includes recruitment, employee relations, performance management, and compliance with labor laws and company policies. The ideal candidate will have excellent interpersonal skills, a strong understanding of HR practices, and the ability to foster a positive work environment. Key Responsibilities Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, including job postings, candidate sourcing, interviewing, and selection. Conduct new employee orientations and ensure a smooth onboarding experience. Ensure compliance with labor laws, regulations, and company policies. Update and maintain employee records and documentation. Develop and implement HR strategies and initiatives aligned with organizational goals. Prepare and present HR reports and analytics to management. Required Skills and Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. title: IT Trainer
company: E CAREERPLUZ INFO INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Job Description: An IT Trainer is responsible for delivering high-quality training sessions on various IT-related topics, including software applications, programming, networking, cybersecurity, and other emerging technologies. The trainer ensures that students or professionals gain practical and theoretical knowledge to enhance their IT skills for academic, professional, or career development purposes. Key Responsibilities: 1. Training & Instructional Delivery: Conduct hands-on training sessions on IT subjects such as programming, networking, cybersecurity, data analytics, cloud computing, or software applications. Develop and deliver engaging and interactive lectures, workshops, and practical sessions. Use real-world examples and case studies to help learners understand complex IT concepts. Provide one-on-one mentoring and support to students when needed. 2. Curriculum Development & Content Creation: Design and develop IT training materials, course outlines, and study guides. Update training materials regularly to reflect the latest industry trends and technological advancements. Create online and offline resources such as video tutorials, quizzes, and assignments. 3. Evaluation & Assessment: Assess students' progress through assignments, tests, and practical projects. Provide constructive feedback and guidance to help students improve their IT skills. Ensure learning outcomes align with institutional goals and industry standards. 4. Technical Support & Guidance: Assist students with technical queries related to course content and projects. Guide students on IT certifications, career paths, and professional development opportunities. 5. Administrative & Reporting Tasks: Maintain accurate training records, attendance sheets, and student progress reports. Prepare reports on training effectiveness and suggest improvements. Collaborate with academic and administrative teams to ensure smooth course delivery. 6. Industry & Technology Updates: Stay updated with the latest IT trends, tools, and industry best practices. Participate in professional development programs and certifications. 7. Institutional Collaboration & Support: Work with faculty members to integrate IT training into academic curricula. Coordinate with other departments to organize IT-related events, seminars, and workshops. Support students in projects, hackathons, and internship programs.
additional_skills: Excellent knowledge in IT, Communication skill

title: AC Technician
description: AC Technician Job Role & Responsibilities Job Summary: An AC Technician is responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing air conditioning systems in residential, commercial, and industrial settings. They diagnose issues, perform regular maintenance, and ensure that HVAC systems operate efficiently and safely. Key Responsibilities: Installation & Setup: Install new air conditioning systems, including split, Duct, Cassette, and central AC units. Connect systems to electrical and refrigerant lines. Ensure proper insulation and ductwork installation. Maintenance & Servicing: Perform routine maintenance such as cleaning filters, coils, and condenser units. Check and refill refrigerant levels if required. Inspect system components for leaks, wear, or damage. Repairs & Troubleshooting: Diagnose and repair electrical and mechanical faults in AC units. Replace faulty components like compressors, thermostats, and capacitors. Identify and fix refrigerant leaks and recharge systems. Requirements: ITI/Diploma in Refrigeration & Air Conditioning or equivalent. Minimum 1-3 years of experience in AC installation / servicing and repair. Knowledge of electrical circuits and refrigeration principles. Ability to use diagnostic tools and repair equipment. Good communication and customer service skills. Physical ability to lift heavy equipment and work in tight spaces.

title: Digital marketing
description: உங்கள் மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்ட் கேஒய்சியை (KYC) எப்படிப் பெறுவது ? ( ஆஃப்லைன் மற்றும் ஆன்லைன் ) மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்டுக்கான கேஒய்சி (KYC) செயல்முறையானது , மோசடியான நடவடிக்கைகளைத் தவிர்க்க , செக்யூரிட்டிஸ் அண்ட் எக்ஸ்சேஞ்ச் போர்டு ஆஃப் இந்தியா (SEBI) ஆல் கட்டாயப்படுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளது . இது ஒரு முறை செயல்முறையாகும் , ஒருமுறை முடிந்தவுடன் , அனைத்து மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்டுகளிலும் உள்ள முதலீடுகளுக்கு கேஒய்சி (KYC) இணக்கம் செல்லுபடியாகும் . ஆதார் அடிப்படையிலான இகேஒய்சி (eKYC) : A எளிமைப்படுத்தப்பட்ட ஆன்லைன் கேஒய்சி (KYC) செயல்முறை , இகேஒய்சி (eKYC) முதலீட்டாளர்களை அங்கீகரிக்க ஆதார் தரவுத்தளத்தைப் பயன்படுத்துகிறது . நேரில் சரிபார்ப்பு தேவையில்லை . இருப்பினும் , கேஒய்சி (KYC) செயல்முறையானது செபி (SEBI)- பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட கேஒய்சி (KYC) பயனர் ஏஜென்சி மூலம் முடிக்கப்பட வேண்டும் .** * உங்கள் மின்னஞ்சல் ஐடி மற்றும் மொபைல் எண் உங்கள் ஆதார் கார்டுடன் பதிவு செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளதையும் , மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்டிற்கான விண்ணப்பத்தில் உள்ளிடப்பட்டுள்ள மின்னஞ்சல் ஐடி மற்றும் மொபைல் எண்ணையும் உறுதிப்படுத்தவும் . ** கேஒய்சி (KYC) பயனர் ஏஜென்சியுடன் பதிவு செய்வது என்பது ஆன்லைன் கேஒய்சி (KYC) பதிவு மற்றும் ஓ . டி . பி (OTP) ஆகியவற்றை உள்ளடக்கிய ஒரு முறை செயல்முறையாகும் . கேஒய்சி (KYC) என்பது மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்டுகளுக்கான ஒரு முறை செயல்முறையா? ஆம் , மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்டுகளுக்கான கேஒய்சி (KYC) என்பது ஒரு முறை செயல்முறையாகும் . உங்கள் கேஒய்சி (KYC) இணக்கத்தை நீங்கள் முடித்தவுடன் , அனைத்து மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்டுகளிலும் உள்ள முதலீடுகளுக்கு இது செல்லுபடியாகும் . எனவே , ஒவ்வொரு மியூச்சுவல் ஃபண்ட் முதலீட்டிற்கும் கேஒய்சி (KYC) செயல்முறையை மீண்டும் செய்ய வேண்டிய அவசியமில்லை .

title: Field Surveyor
description: Job Description: As a Field Surveyor at Mobitech, you will play a crucial role in gathering essential data for the planning, design, and implementation of irrigation automation systems. You will be responsible for conducting on-site surveys, collecting accurate information, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful deployment of our cutting-edge solutions. Key Responsibilities: On-Site Surveys: Conduct thorough field surveys to assess the existing irrigation infrastructure and environmental conditions. Utilize surveying tools and equipment to gather precise measurements and data. Data Collection: Collect and document relevant data on soil types, topography, water sources, and other factors affecting irrigation efficiency. Work closely with the engineering team to ensure accurate data interpretation. Stakeholder Collaboration: Collaborate with farmers, landowners, and other stakeholders to understand their requirements and concerns. Provide clear communication on survey findings and proposed irrigation solutions. Mapping and Documentation: Create detailed maps and reports based on survey data for use in the design and planning phases. Maintain accurate and organized documentation throughout the survey process. Quality Assurance: Ensure the quality and reliability of collected data by conducting regular checks and validations. Address any discrepancies or issues promptly and efficiently. Adaptability: Demonstrate flexibility to work in diverse geographical locations and adapt to varying environmental conditions. Willingness to travel extensively as per project requirements. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Agriculture, Engineering(EEE, ECE, E&I and any electrical domain), or a related field. Proven experience in field surveys and data collection is more advantage. Familiarity with irrigation systems and agricultural practices. Proficient in using surveying tools and equipment. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently.

title: TECHNICIAN
description: Key responsibilities of a car technician: Vehicle Inspection: Thoroughly examine vehicles to identify potential problems, including checking fluid levels, tire pressure, and overall condition. Diagnostic Testing: Use computerized diagnostic tools to pinpoint the cause of vehicle malfunctions. Repair and Maintenance: Perform repairs on various vehicle systems like engines, brakes, electrical systems, suspension, and transmission, including replacing worn parts. Preventative Maintenance: Conduct routine maintenance tasks like oil changes, tire rotations, and filter replacements. Parts Replacement: Order and install necessary replacement parts according to manufacturer specifications. Test Drives: Conduct test drives after repairs to verify proper functionality. Customer Communication: Explain repair needs to customers in a clear and understandable manner. Documentation: Maintain detailed records of repairs and parts used on each vehicle.

title: Purchase Manager
description: Supplier Management : Identify and establish relationships with reliable suppliers/vendors, negotiate prices, terms, and contracts, and maintain effective communication. Procurement Strategy : Develop and implement procurement strategies that align with the company’s goals and budgets. Ensure the best value for money while maintaining product quality. Inventory Control : Oversee inventory levels, monitor stock levels, and order materials/products in a timely manner to avoid shortages or overstocking. Cost Management : Manage the procurement budget, monitor spending, and find ways to reduce costs without compromising quality. Order Management : Ensure timely ordering of goods and services. Track orders to ensure they are delivered on time and in good condition. Market Research : Stay up-to-date with market trends, new suppliers, and products. Conduct regular market research to find the best deals and evaluate potential suppliers. Quality Assurance : Ensure that purchased goods and services meet quality standards. Conduct regular audits to maintain compliance with quality specifications. Risk Management : Assess potential risks in the supply chain and develop strategies to mitigate them, including supply disruptions or price fluctuations. Team Leadership : Supervise and mentor junior purchasing staff, ensuring they meet departmental objectives and company standards. Reporting and Documentation : Maintain accurate procurement records, including purchase orders, supplier information, and contract details. Prepare regular reports for senior management.
additional_skills: Negotiation Skill, Vendor Management, Supply chain Communication

title: Purchase Executive
description: Procurement Support : Assist in sourcing and selecting suppliers for goods and services required by the company. Purchase Orders : Prepare and process purchase orders, ensuring accuracy in product specifications, quantities, and pricing. Supplier Liaison : Communicate with suppliers to follow up on order status, delivery schedules, and any issues related to procurement. Inventory Management : Monitor inventory levels and assist in ensuring the organization maintains optimal stock levels. Price Negotiation : Support negotiations with suppliers to ensure competitive pricing and favorable terms. Order Tracking : Track orders, monitor delivery schedules, and ensure timely receipt of goods. Documentation : Maintain accurate records of purchase transactions, including purchase orders, supplier contracts, and invoices. Quality Control : Ensure that products received meet the required quality standards and specifications. Supplier Performance : Assist in evaluating supplier performance, including quality, cost, and delivery timelines. Compliance : Ensure that all procurement activities comply with company policies, legal requirements, and industry standards. Reporting : Prepare reports related to purchases, inventory levels, and supplier performance for management review.
additional_skills: Negotiation , Vendor Management,MS Excel, Communication, etcc

title: Driver Crane / Hydra
description: A Hydra Operator is responsible for operating a Hydra crane, typically used for lifting, loading, unloading, and moving heavy materials and equipment, particularly in construction, logistics, and industrial environments. The role requires a strong understanding of crane operation, safety protocols, and the ability to manage various tasks related to lifting and handling heavy loads. rane Operation : Operate the Hydra crane to lift and move heavy materials, machinery, and equipment across construction sites, warehouses, or other designated areas. Material Handling : Load and unload materials, ensuring that items are placed accurately and securely in the right locations. Maintenance Checks : Perform daily pre-operational checks on the Hydra crane, including inspecting the hydraulic system, cables, brakes, and other components to ensure proper functioning. Safety Compliance : Follow all safety protocols, including using personal protective equipment (PPE), ensuring the safety of personnel working near the crane, and adhering to local regulations and safety standards. Coordination : Work closely with ground staff, riggers, and other team members to ensure the safe and efficient movement of materials and equipment. Communicate effectively to avoid accidents or errors. Load Management : Ensure the safe loading and unloading of items by calculating and confirming load weight, verifying the capacity of the crane, and securing materials before movement. Record Keeping : Maintain logs of crane operation, including hours worked, maintenance performed, and any issues encountered during operation. Report any mechanical faults or breakdowns to the supervisor. Site Preparation : Set up and prepare the site for crane operation, including marking load zones, ensuring proper clearance for the crane, and making necessary adjustments based on site conditions. Troubleshooting : Identify and resolve minor mechanical or operational issues with the Hydra crane. Report major mechanical issues to the maintenance team for repair.
skills: Driver Special Vehicle, Hydra Crane Operator

description: வேலை செய்து கொண்டே தொடர்ந்து கற்கப் பிடிக்கும். ஒரு software-ஐ உருவாக்கப் பிடிக்கும். உருவாக்கிய  சாப்ட்வேர்-ஆல் மக்கள் பயன் பெறுவதை என் உழைப்பின் பலனாக பார்ப்பேன். பயனாளர்களுக்கு கற்பிக்கப் பிடிக்கும். பயனாளர்கள் தரும் பணம் - என் உழைப்பால் வந்த பணம் - பெருமிதம் தரும். பொறுப்புடன், ஒழுங்குடன் சக படைப்பாளிகளுடன் கூட்டாக உழைப்பது பிடிக்கும். Coding  பிடிக்கும். - மேற்கண்ட மனப்பாங்கு இருந்தால் - Java - HTML - CSS - SQL - கொண்டு AI based  ERP, CRM software டீம்-ல் சேர மெயில் அனுப்பவும்.: hrd@nelly.software (Any degree OK. - Salary as per your current skill set)
